title: Presidential Nominations Sent to the Senate | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
March 29, 2012

 



Presidential Nominations Sent to the Senate





NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:

	Patrick A. Miles, Jr., of Michigan, to be United States Attorney for the Western District of Michigan for the term of four years, vice Margaret M. Chiara, resigned.

	Patrick J. Wilkerson, of Oklahoma, to be United States Marshal for the Eastern District of Oklahoma for the term of four years, vice John William Loyd, term expired.

	Danny Chappelle Williams, Sr., of Oklahoma, to be United States Attorney for the Northern District of Oklahoma for the term of four years, vice David E. O'Meilia, term expired.
